products.title: Bari Spc, Rhino - Roller Blind
products.description: The bari spc in rhino features a distinct material with a plentiful and compelling texture, due to the high quality stitching. Layering the subtly textured blind with contrasting cottons in these subdued hues will help to produce a plentiful decor with harmonising shades.

products.title: Bari Spc, Mischka - Roller Blind
products.description: Form a contemporary haven with the bari spc in mischka, with its compelling texture and modern dove grey shade. Blend the mischka with a chic collection of whites, charcoals, and subdued greys to generate a modern colour scheme with a subtle monochrome influence.

products.title: Bari Spc, Merino - Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for creating a sophisticated look, the exquisite bari spc in merino features an elegant shade of cream on a resilient cloth adorned with textured stitching. This graceful blind also offers a valuable solar protective coating which helps to keep the room at a comfortable temperature, whatever the time of year. Present the merino in your master bedroom with a soothing palette of creamy tones and compelling golden hues.

products.title: Bari Spc, Coconut - Roller Blind

products.title: Bari Spc, Manatee - Roller Blind

And all with a contemporary, cool grey finish to accommodate any surrounding. Pair this substantial cloth with opulent linens or plush velvety fabrics to produce classic style with compelling textures.
